White_Plains.Pace University School of Law: The Elisabeth Haub School of Law at Pace University (formerly Pace Law School), is the law school of Pace University, a comprehensive, independent, and diversified university with campuses in New York City and Westchester County. Founded in 1976, Pace Law School is accredited by the American Bar Association and is located in White Plains, New York. According to Pace Law School's 2014 ABA-required disclosures, 58% of the Class of 2014 obtained full-time, long-term, JD-required employment after graduation.
